attributes.action: Remove TFL Cycle Lane in Chiswick High Road London
attributes.additional_details: Already there has been accidents and deaths are going to be imminent. The congestion also of traffic is solid every weekend. Making the high street a nightmare to get from West to east visa versa. The scheme is an absolute shambles and dangerous.
attributes.background:
The cycle lane on the junction of Chiswick High Road and Dukes Avenue is death trap. Already an elderly person has been knocked down. The majority of cyclist do NOT stop at the traffic lights and  mount the pavement constantly.
Blind and disabled people have to cross cycle land to get to bus stop.

rejection.details: You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
